devdoc.author: Sooyoung Hyun
devdoc.details: For more implementation details read the "design_pattern_decisions.md" document.

params._imageLink: It will be IPFS hash value.

balanceOf().details: Function used in frontend to display the balance.

buy(uint256,uint256).details: Buy product and make new order.

getAuth(address).details: Function used in frontend to check the user authority.
getAuth(address).return: Uint Number of elements of the enum Auth.

getOrder(uint256).details: Function used in frontend to display the orders.
getOrder(uint256).return: uint Order ID.uint Product ID.uint Amount of product.uint Total price of order.address Buyer of product.

getProduct(uint256).details: Function used in frontend to display the products.
getProduct(uint256).return: uint Product ID.string Name of product.string Description of product.string IPFS hash.uint Price of product.uint Amount of product.address Owner of product.

getRequest(uint256).details: Function used in frontend to check the user authority.

isOwner().return: true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

requestAuth().details: The smart contract work as an online market place.  You can't add a product if your authority is not store owner.

setAuth(address).details: Only owner can use this function to change user authority.

toggleContractActive().details: Owner of the smart contract activate the emergency stop.  Function 'buy' and 'withdraw' can't be called.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

withdraw().details: Withdraw the deposit stored in the contract.

devdoc.title: Market place on Ethereum

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.

userdoc.notice: You can use this contract to create online market place based on smart contracts.
